thread.title: Island of corruption: A journalist's assassination

title: Island of corruption: A journalist's assassination
text:
Island of corruption: A journalist's assassination 12:38pm EDT - 02:44 
On a speck of an island in the Mediterranean, a Maltese journalist's unsolved murder rips open the dark underbelly of the country and the visceral hatred of her by foes. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
On a speck of an island in the Mediterranean, a Maltese journalist's unsolved murder rips open the dark underbelly of the country and the visceral hatred of her by foes. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2J3zYXs
